title: The 25 most valuable brands worldwide 2020
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 220791.0 is found at Brand Amazon and the minimum is found at Volkswagen where Brand is 44897.0.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Brand is 175894.0.
